name: Museum of Russian Culture
description: Established 1948, features folk costumes, art, photographs from pre-revolutionary Russia, and WWII memorabilia. Free admission, open Wed & Sat 10:30am-2:30pm.
fullDescription: Established 1948, features folk costumes, art, photographs from pre-revolutionary Russia, and WWII memorabilia. Free admission, open Wed & Sat 10:30am-2:30pm.
keywords: Museum of Russian Culture, Russian history, San Francisco, folk costumes, pre-revolutionary Russia, WWII, free admission, Richmond District
